title: How to Draw a Bald Eagle

steps.headline: Draw a big triangle.
steps.description: This will serve as a guideline for the whole eagle with wings wide open.

steps.headline: Draw an oval at the middle for the torso and a small rectangle for the tail.
Draw the head of the eagle by drawing a triangle with a hooked end and adding a small circle for the eyes.
Draw the width of the wings.
steps.description: At the tip of the triangles, draw a semicircle with fanning lines.

steps.headline: Ink the drawing.
steps.description: Remember to use the sketch as a guide.

text: Draw a big triangle. This will serve as a guideline for the whole eagle with wings wide open. Draw an oval at the middle for the torso and a small rectangle for the tail.  Draw the head of the eagle by drawing a triangle with a hooked end and adding a small circle for the eyes.  Draw the width of the wings. At the tip of the triangles, draw a semicircle with fanning lines. Ink the drawing. Remember to use the sketch as a guide. Color the drawing.
